title: Note Tool
description: A simple, elegant note-taking tool that lives in your browser. Create, edit, and organize your thoughts with automatic saving.

title: H3 Power Timer
description: Track power node timers for Halo 3 multiplayer maps. Perfect for competitive players who want to optimize their gameplay.

title: Base64 Tools
description: Convert images to Base64 encoding and preview Base64-encoded images. Simple tools for working with Base64 image data.
